amendment.description: An amendment numbered 167 printed in Part A of House Report 118-216 to prevent funds in this act to be used to provide assistance to house persons on military installations.

vote.text: On agreeing to the D'Esposito amendment (A023) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the D'Esposito amendment (A023) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the D'Esposito amendment (A023) Agreed to by voice vote.
